thread.title: Hotel Phillips taps local talent for PR agency of record
thread.title_full: Hotel Phillips taps local talent for PR agency of record

author: Leslie Collins
title: Hotel Phillips taps local talent for PR agency of record
text:
Hotel Phillips taps local talent for PR agency of record Jul 28, 2015, 11:03am CDT Industries & Tags Leslie Collins Web Producer Kansas City Business Journal Leslie Collins Web Producer Kansas City Business Journal Home of the Day The Hotel Phillips sits on 12th Street between Baltimore Avenue and Wyandotte Street. Itâ€¦ more Hotel Phillips tapped local talent for its public relations agency of record. In its new role, Kansas City-based Socialworx PR will be tasked with elevating the hotel's communication strategy, building long-term brand awareness, providing social media strategy and educating consumers about the hotel and its amenities, according to a release. "We selected Socialworx PR because of owner Jenny Kincaid 's immense knowledge of Kansas City," Sandi Harkins , director of sales and marketing at Hotel Phillips, said in a release. "She is very well-connected and has proven herself through the companies she's worked with to tell 'their' story." Socialworx PR is a public and social relations firm that specializes in startups and locally owned businesses. Its clients have included La Bodega, Lead Bank, the Kansas City Repertory Theatre and Fit Formula, among others.
